messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]
messages.msgSnippet: where can we find information on the conference..I was aware of september in New Mexico... but not may in Mass Thanks andre unschooling in Indiana Broguen !7
messages.messageBody:
where can we find information on the conference..I was aware of september in New Mexico... but not may in Mass
Thanks
andre'
unschooling in Indiana
Broguen !7 - LeCe 15 - Trinity 11 and Aubra 4

camden <ccoutlaw@...> wrote:
Hi All,

In anticipation of the May conference I have set up a yahoo group for the kids & teens. My hope is some connections might be made even before the conference.

This will be a safe place for the kids to send messages & post pictures if they choose.

In the interest of safety (not control) all members will have to be approved by me & all areas are only open to members. I hope this will make it so all the kids (and parents) no matter what age will feel comfortable here.

Please pass along to anyone you know is coming or thinking about coming to the conference !!

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NortheastUnschoolingConferencekidsnteens


See you in May !!

Carol

messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

In anticipation of the May conference I have set up a yahoo group for the kids & teens. My hope is some connections might be made even before the conference.

This will be a safe place for the kids to send messages & post pictures if they choose.

In the interest of safety (not control) all members will have to be approved by me & all areas are only open to members. I hope this will make it so all the kids (and parents) no matter what age will feel comfortable here.

Please pass along to anyone you know is coming or thinking about coming to the conference !!

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/NortheastUnschoolingConferencekidsnteens


See you in May !!

Carol
